original_text:
Without pity the Lord has swallowed up
    all the dwellings of Jacob;
in his wrath he has torn down
    the strongholds of Daughter Judah.
He has brought her kingdom and its princes
    down to the ground in dishonor.
korean_text: 주께서 야곱의 모든 거처들을 삼키시고 긍휼히 여기지 아니하셨음이여 노하사 딸 유다의 견고한 성채들을 허물어 땅에 엎으시고 나라와 그 지도자들을 욕되게 하셨도다

sentences.original_text: Without pity the Lord has swallowed up
in his wrath he has torn down
sentences.korean_translation: 그 진노 중에 유다 딸의 견고한 성을 헐어 버리셨으니

sentences.original_text: He has brought her kingdom and its princes
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그 나라와 그 방백들을 땅에 엎드러뜨려

sentences.original_text: down to the ground in dishonor
